articles.description: The Critics Choice Association announced Wednesday that it has postponed its in-person awards gala amid rising concerns regarding COVID-19 and the Omicron variant. The winners were set to be revealed by hosts Taye Diggs and Nicole Byer on Sunday, Jan. 9. The …
articles.content:

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: John Wick 4 release date pushed to 2023 - Polygon
articles.description: John Wick: Chapter 4’s release date is now March 24, 2023, Lionsgate announced in a new YouTube teaser trailer. John Wick 4 was previously scheduled for release in 2022.
articles.content: Keanu will be seeing you a little later

articles.author: Brian Truitt, USA TODAY
articles.title: 'You couldn't make it up': How 'The King's Man' became a 'crazy' World War I history lesson - USA TODAY
articles.description: Matthew Vaughn's 'Kingsman' spy franchise spins a history lesson with prequel 'The King's Man,' which weaves in real World War I events and figures.
articles.content: From related rulers to some seriously oddball villains, director Matthew Vaughn found a lot of World War I history to be stranger than fiction, enough to be a perfect background for the earliest days… [+5566 chars]
